amendment.description: Amendment strikes the addition of "natural stone" to the list of commodity products that can petition the USDA for the issuance of a promotion and research order.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 50 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to strike the addition of "natural stone" to the list of commodity products that can petition the USDA for the issuance of a promotion and research center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 211 (Roll no. 280).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 211 (Roll no. 280).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Walberg.
